name: Word War Classic
description:
Word War Classic is a 2-player online multiplayer word game where you use the dictionary of words known to you to defeat your opponent. You can either win through achieving a target or when the opponent runs out of time.

Game Modes: Two modes of gameplay are available along with a special 'Survival' mode.

1. Trail mode: The last letter of your opponent's word must be your first letter to start a word with.

2. Random mode: A random letter will be generated each turn to start your word with.
(Note: Initial target will be of 50 in both of the above modes.)

Survival Mode: In this mode you can only win when either of the player runs out of time, but the catch here is that you can increase your timer value each turn by a value equal to the number of letters in your word. 
(Note: Initial value of timer will be 15 seconds and a maximum increment of 8 is allowed at once.)

Controls:-
-All alphabets in a keyboard along with the enter key.
-You can type pass to skip or pass your turn.
(Note: A maximum of 3 pass can be used in survival mode)
